text: For anyone who hates basketball (or isn’t going tomorrow) and loves data, <http://Keen.io|Keen.io> is hosting a happy hour: <http://www.eventbrite.com/e/happy-data-hour-pdx-4-13-tickets-24409436281>

attachments.title: Happy Data Hour (PDX 4-13)
attachments.text: We love data and so do you! Join Keen IO and PIE (Portland Incubator Experiment) for a casual drinkup! Chat data, startups, and APIs, tell us what you really think about our services, or just swing by and hang a bit.  Below is some nerdy JSON which probably looks terrible on your mobile device :) {     "event": {         "name": "Happy Data Hour",         "type": "meetup",         "pretty_timestamp": "April 13th, 5:30pm-8:30pm (localtime)",         "location": {             "venue":"Tilt",             "street_address"1355 NW Everett St",             "city":"Portland",             "state":"OR",             "zip": 97209        },          "beverages": true,          "host": "Keen IO & PIE"     } } 1355 NW Everett St
